creator: steve.downey@netfolio.com
text:
Jasper emits the line String  _value = null; as one of the implicit objects 
available to jsp pages (i.e. out, config, application). However, it's not one 
of the defined objects, nor is it in the jsp implementation namespace (jsp, 
_jsp, jspx, _jspx). 

It also doesn't seem to be used anywhere for anything.

Created attachment 971
Get rid of the implicit page object _value
creator: steve.downey@netfolio.com
kin-man.chung@sun.com
text:
This is a FIXED for jasper2 and WONTFIX for jasper, because it is really
harmless and jasper is eventually going to be replaced by jasper.
